magicbook.gtlitecore.client.model.quad

接口 ModelQuadView


  • public interface ModelQuadView

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default void copyInto(java.nio.ByteBuffer buf, int pos)
      Copies this quad's data into the specified buffer starting at the given position.
      int getColor(int index) 
      int getColorIndex() 
      net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing getCullFace()
      If not null, then quad shouldn't be rendered in-world if the opposite face of a neighbor block occludes it.
      int getFlags() 
      int getLight(int index) 
      net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing getLightFace()
      This is the face used for vanilla lighting calculations and will be the block face to which the quad is most closely aligned.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getX

        float getX(int index)
        返回:
        The x-position of the vertex at index.

      • getY

        float getY(int index)
        返回:
        The y-position of the vertex at index.

      • getZ

        float getZ(int index)
        返回:
        The z-position of the vertex at index.

      • getColor

        int getColor(int index)
        返回:
        The integer encoded color (ARGB) of the vertex at index.

      • getColorIndex

        int getColorIndex()
        返回:
        The color index of this quad.

      • getTextureU

        float getTextureU(int index)
        返回:
        The texture x-coordinate for the vertex at index.

      • getTextureV

        float getTextureV(int index)
        返回:
        The texture y-coordinate for the vertex at index.

      • getFlags

        int getFlags()
        返回:
        The integer bit flags containing the ModelQuadFlags for this quad.

      • getLight

        int getLight(int index)
        返回:
        The lightmap texture coordinates for the vertex at index.

      • getNormal

        int getNormal(int index)
        返回:
        The integer encoded normal vector for the vertex at index.

      • getCullFace

        net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing getCullFace()
        If not null, then quad shouldn't be rendered in-world if the opposite face of a neighbor block occludes it.

      • getLightFace

        net.minecraft.util.EnumFacing getLightFace()
        This is the face used for vanilla lighting calculations and will be the block face to which the quad is most closely aligned. Always the same as cull face for quads that are on a block face, but never null.

      • getSprite

        net.minecraft.client.renderer.texture.TextureAtlasSprite getSprite()
        返回:
        The sprite texture used by this quad, or null if none is attached.

      • copyInto

        default void copyInto(java.nio.ByteBuffer buf,
                      int pos)
        Copies this quad's data into the specified buffer starting at the given position.
        参数:
        buf - The buffer to write this quad's data to.
        pos - The starting byte index to write to.
